prompt.description: Create a string to be used in an automated email to the customer notifying them of their account balance.
prompt.name: Customer Account Balance Email
prompt.template:
CRITICAL: Output ONLY the HTML code. Do not include any explanations, comments, or wrapper text. RESPONSE FORMAT: Begin directly with and end with NO MARKDOWN: Do not wrap the HTML in code blocks or backticks. You are an HTML code generator. Your sole function is to output valid HTML/CSS code. ROLE: HTML Code Generator OUTPUT: Raw HTML only RESTRICTIONS: No explanations, no commentary, no additional text
Expected output structure:
[HTML content here]
Generate the email following this exact structure with no additional text.
Generate a professional full HTML and CSS email body for customer account balance notifications. The email should be marketing-heavy while clearly conveying account information.
CUSTOMER DATA VARIABLES: - Customer Name: ${companyname} - Account Number: ${account_number} - Current Balance: ${balance} - Past Due Amount: ${overduebalance} - Unbilled Order Amount ${unbilledorders} - Days Past Due: ${daysoverdue} - Standard Payment Terms: ${terms} - Primary Currency: ${currency} - Credit Limit: ${creditlimit}
CONDITIONAL LOGIC: - If current balance ( ${balance} )> 0: Include balance details, payment information, and urgency messaging - If current balance ( ${balance} ) = 0: Thank customer for paid-in-full status - If past due amount ( ${overduebalance} )> 0: Add urgent payment messaging and penalty warnings and do not suggest any promotions - If days overdue ${daysoverdue} > 7: Emphasize urgency with bold styling and do not suggest any promotions
EMAIL STRUCTURE REQUIREMENTS:
**HEADER SECTION:** - Company logo placeholder - Eye-catching promotional banner - Personalized greeting with customer name - Account number reference
**BODY SECTION:** - Account balance information (styled prominently) - Payment details if balance exists - Promotional content (minimum 40% of body content) - Call-to-action buttons for shopping and payments - Current promotions section
**FOOTER SECTION:** - Contact information - Social media links - Unsubscribe link - Legal disclaimers
DESIGN REQUIREMENTS: - Professional, modern HTML design - Mobile-responsive layout - Brand-consistent color scheme (use placeholder colors) - Clear hierarchy with headings and sections - Marketing elements should be visually prominent - Use tables for email client compatibility
TONE AND MESSAGING: - Professional yet friendly - Marketing-forward approach - Create urgency for overdue accounts without being aggressive - Celebratory tone for paid-in-full accounts - Always include promotional opportunities
PROMOTIONAL ELEMENTS TO INCLUDE: - Weekly promotions section - "Shop Online at Genius Industries" messaging - https://geniusindustries.com - Cross-sell opportunities - Loyalty program mentions - Special offers for account holders
IF Current Balance: ${balance} = 0 THEN - Use "PAID IN FULL" success styling (green accents) - Focus 60% on promotional content - Add loyalty rewards messaging
IF Days Overdue: ${daysoverdue} > 0 THEN - Use urgent styling (red/orange accents) - Add penalty warning callout box - Include multiple payment options
IF Days Overdue ${daysoverdue} > 3 THEN - Add "URGENT" badges - Use countdown timer styling - Emphasize immediate action needed
Generate the complete HTML email body with inline CSS styling for maximum email client compatibility.
DO NOT include: - Explanatory text before or after the HTML - Code block markers (```) - Comments like "Here's the HTML:" or "This code will..." - Any sentences or paragraphs - Markdown formatting
Start your response immediately with: End your response with: Nothing else should appear in your response.
